website_summaries.verdict: This is an extremely warm flannel shirt that comes in a multitude of colors and patterns.
pros: Won’t shrink in the dryer, even when dried on the high setting
Provides ample warmth, making this the perfect pick to wear all winter long
Despite providing much warmth, doesn’t feel heavy
Material is soft and of high quality
cons: Shirt has a tendency to develop static in cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great arm length. My boyfriend is 6’4” and I ordered an XLTall, which is his normal size. He has the sleeve rolled in the photo, but they fit great! It’s really think and more like a “fleece” type material. Really warm and fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morris

customer_reviews.title: at last
customer_reviews.text: what a great gift this was, the sleeves were long enough with out the body of the shirt being huge. Nice fit, stays tucked in! I will buy from this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Bennybaby

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father as a gift. Very thick! Great for outdoor wear, might be a little too warm inside. He loves it and wears it all the time. Very durable and he’s a big tall guy who does a lot of handy work in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Wanted some Wrangler Flannels in XLT and this was the first place I found any in that size.
customer_reviews.text: As in the title, I wanted some XL-T sized Wrangler flannel shirts, long sleeve, with two shirt pockets. I wanted longer tails than the other XL ones I already own, that would not pull out of my pants when working. These do fine for me in that area.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kinda fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: My fault, I was looking for flannel shirts and based on appearance chose this one. It is fleece not flannel. Since Hubby has a tendency to wear a flannel with a vest, he said he would try them. Next time I will read a bit more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson-Jo M McCulley

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a shirt
customer_reviews.text: The cuffs are a bit small otherwise great fit. Has held up to standard workshop and working around the property tasks just fine. Doubles as a light jacket nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great cold weather shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made of mid weight fabric. Buttons are pretty small, but this is a fleece shirt, not a wind resistant jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE & SOFT FLANNEL!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM 6'3" TALL AND WEIGH 230 LBS AND ORDERED THE XL TALL AND IT FITS PERFECT. LIKE THE SOFT D=FEL BUT THE TRUEW TEST WILL BE HOW WELL IT HOLDS UP! VERY COMFORTABLE SHIRT. JUST WISH IT HAD 2 BUTTONS ON SLEEVES FOR TIGHT OF LOOSE SETTING BUT LIKE THE P=CHEST POCKET FLAPS!
customer_reviews.author: Winston Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall men and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my very tall husband perfect and without being too short. It is a thicker material so definitely for cooler or cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and feel of this on my 6'3" 128 lb hubby! I ordered him a XLT and he wears it all the time. Comfy, soft, warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wameling

customer_reviews.title: thin material
customer_reviews.text: nice looking shirt, not fleece lined as advertised, very thin material, don't wear outside in the wind... you will be cold!
customer_reviews.author: pat hazen

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Shirt for a Great Guy
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fit; perfect for my husband’s birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Milburn

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, warm shirt. My husband is an xlt and 6'4 and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great as a jacket for girls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear as a jacket and I lovvee it. It makes outfits so casual cute
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: I ordered three.  I have not received the blue one yet. Received blue one.
customer_reviews.text: They fit better than anything I have bought lately. I may purchase more after the Holidays. I still may order more after Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how warm this was. It fit fantasticly and didn't shrink much in the dryer. I have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Big and tall is not big or tall.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. If you are big OR tall and not big AND tall this fits. I am 6'6 215 and I love this flannel. I am not am not super skinny, but I am wirey and have a long torso. I bought the XLT and I wear a Levi's 36 38
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Weber

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear XL. I exchanged it for a Large which fit nicely. The shirt is good quality. The fabric is soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and great weight for winter, very soft and nice print.
customer_reviews.author: booklady

customer_reviews.title: I love the attention I get
customer_reviews.text: Way back, when I had I had the red & black lumberjack, wit the hat ta match!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Longer & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like that it's longer ,very comfortable,I wear it for my coat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Will order again in the near future, better than expected
customer_reviews.author: diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger than expected but the length was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deering

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Fits well - washes well very little wrinkles! 2XLT my Son is 6'6
customer_reviews.author: Valerie K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Thiccc flannel
customer_reviews.text: Okay so if you don’t really read full descriptions like me you’ll assume this is normal flannel material (thin-ish) but this is not that all. I really wanted it for summer but this is like a fall warm flannel almost like a blanket thickness. But even though it wasn’t what I was excepting it’s actually super great quality for the price. My boyfriend stole it and loves it even though it’s a little warm for my taste in flannels.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: I love this shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I really love Wrangler shirts. After buying one of the heavier, quilt lined flannel shirts, I wanted one a little lighter for wearing indoors at work. These shirts are more of a softer material. They remind me of the old soft woolen hunting shirts my Grandfather used to wear, without the itchiness. Very comfortable and warm. Perfect for wearing indoors during cold weather, or wearing under a coat as a layer. I am 6 foot 4, 215 pounds and the XL fits perfectly. I was so pleased with the Buffalo Blue print, that I ordered the gray/black version!
customer_reviews.author: caclark74

customer_reviews.title: Great for holiday pics
customer_reviews.text: True to size . Just as described Very happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: Melanie88

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am not a plaid guy however, this shirt is the beans. Made in Bangladesh, the sewing is the best I have seen in a shirt in years. The fabric is soft next to the skin and not scratchy like the wool shirts our moms used to make us wear. The collar, cuffs and placket are lined. No uncomfortable tags. This shirt is warm and I am wearing it almost like a shirt/jacket with a long sleeve T underneath during our January sub freezing weather. A very handsome, well made shirt...remember, it's fleece...the girls will want to wear it so be prepared. Recommended without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: DEF

customer_reviews.title: Good little flannel
customer_reviews.text: If you normally wear a size XL shirt, like I do, then get the large. I got the XL and it turned out to be too big - returned it - got the large and it fit perfect. Decent quality little flannel; it's comfy, warm, and is made of pretty thick fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wurzel

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter...in Florida, maybe.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, Wrangler, what is this shirt supposed to do? I’m guessing not keep me warm since I can see through it! It is snowing outside and I held it up to the window so you could see as well. It’s an OK shirt and I’ll keep it since it’s so inexpensive but if you were looking for something warm and not just pretty, might want to try something made for winter, like a real flannel shirt, not this.
customer_reviews.author: PabloTBL

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He specifically asked for a red & black plaid flannel. He loves the soft fabric. Truthfully, I hesitated to buy this because he ends up with favorite shirts and come cooler weather I Guarantee this will be his go to shirt every chance he gets!
customer_reviews.author: lilacs & lilies

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable. On top of that I washed it and ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits me a tad bit larger than all my other flannels from other brands of the same Small size. Still, very warm, well made, and comfortable. On top of that I washed it and dried it on high temperatures and I don't think it shrank much if at all. Plenty of room for a hoodie underneath (since my work place requires collared shirts over anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan R

customer_reviews.title: pleasurable comfort plus quality
customer_reviews.text: I am most happy with these flannel shirts. The sizing is accurate according to their vendor outlet description. The tailoring is excellent and the quality of the material makes the wearing very comfortable. Of all of men's flannel shirt merchandisers, I believe these would be hard to beat or improve on, and the price in my opinion is reasonable and acceptable, however, due to large number of sellers of these types of shirts, it takes a considerable amount of research on line, to come up with this particular offering
customer_reviews.author: gejome

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use an iron! Terrible fabric!
customer_reviews.text: You know when i first got this polyester flannel i was real pleased and could hsve made the mistake and given it 4 stars.... the people who did these reviews did not iron their shirts yet. Iron it and you see the fabric is garbage and will melt onto the iron. Glad i didn’t order another one and I’m taking time out of my day to warn you.
customer_reviews.author: salods

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as last year's version.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these shirts (different color) last year and it is incredible. I used the "order it again" feature on Amazon and only changed the color. The shirt is nice but the material is much thinner and the shirt is not nearly as warm as last years. I like the shirt but I am very disappointed that it is of lesser quality than a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaRanger

customer_reviews.title: but it fits more like a LG
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my husband and when it came In, I put it on! It fit me! I know it will be too small for my husband and the arms will be too short for him. I ordered an xlarge, but it fits more like a LG. Its very nice and bright! Nicely made, but I would suggest to order up a size or maybe 2 sizes if you want it bigger! I love it, but will give 4⛥ because it's too small! I will not send it back because it's really nice and I will wear it as an over shirt/light jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Check the material before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shirt that I’d eventually want to match with (I’m a lady) my love, the colors were off and the material was just different than what I expected. Not what I want. So make sure you check the material before wasting your time and buying this item. Very nice soft material (warm for winter) but not what I need. Also the size XL looks way too big for what it’s actually should be not sure if sizes run larger. Took a couple of photos comparing a regular shirt that would fit him and it’s like soo much bigger
customer_reviews.author: Karis A

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad to wear for family photos and it was great! Good material and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. It seems true to size, I bought a 3x which is bigger than what he normally wears, but I wanted extra room for layering. You could wear this as a light jacket or for layering in the colder months. I bought the blue and it is true to the color the seller advertised. It is very, very soft and should keep him warm. It seems well made and should last him a while using this for casual wear or when doing chores outside. I am very happy with this product and I am glad the price was not as high as other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Corby

customer_reviews.title: Bad material fleece not flannel
customer_reviews.text: This is a fleece shirt not flannel. Very thick material. I was disappointed as I gave this to my husband as a Christmas present to match my sons blue and black checkered shirt. It does not look anywhere near as nice as in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I like this shirt quite a bit. It looks like flannel but has the feel and breathability of fleece. I tend to wear it like a jacket or sweater for warmth around the house. One complaint, it's an open weave with a fuzzy texture. That probably means its going to pill. I'm trying to wash it as little as possible to preserve the life of the garment, just in case. I expect it will probably only last a few years, where if they'd used a closed weave I could probably get a decade out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good but runs big in an XL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size XL. I’m 5’11, 210. In almost every brand of flannel I am an XL. One exception is Carhart and apparently this Wrangler flannel, I am definitely a size large in this wrangler shirt. XL fit me like everyone of my other 2XL shirts. Ordered the large and it fits fine, The size large was not formfitting it wrong relatively loosely the way it should covering my waist band without being tight. It’s a good shirt, synthetic, warm, great price seems doable, returned it for the size large
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flannel
customer_reviews.text: Great combination of soft yet warm. Don't know how they pulled it off. It's not a heavy thick flannel but still feels very cozy. Only complaint would be the wrist buttons felt too close. Unless I have huge wrists? But that seems unlikely since the rest of the shirt fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bf - 6'1 180 lbs, the large fits will. He can still throw a layer or 2 under Boyfriend loves it- he got a 2nd one to help get through cold pa winters. As a carpenter he works outside and in tough conditions and these not only hold up but keep him warm and feel very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Great warm shirt but runs a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Had to reorder one size down from my usual size in other brands. So if you wear large usually order a medium.😊
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I have two, and I do wear them. They're pretty soft, and they are warm enough. Unfortunately they are bigger than I'd like. I have the correct size, but they're cut wide. I could probably fit two of me in the body, though the sleeves are better (except one of them is sewn on upside down on one shirt, so the cuff buttons are in a weird place. They are also a hair and lint magnet. I have pets, and it really shows when I wear this shirt. They do work well enough, so I never returned them and I still wear them, but not my favorite shirts.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is an amazing shirt. Thick. Worm. Looks good. But it runs big. I've bought the same size clothes since I was 16, and I am 34. This shirt is big. I bought a small. I'm 5' 6" and 145lbs. I bought a small. Way too big. I'm totally keeping it for an outside warm work shirt because it is warm, soft and I love the shirt. But wish it wasn't so dang big and long.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Way too large, but wrists way too small.
customer_reviews.text: What an odd fit! This is larger than most large size shirts, but I ordered medium. I cannot button the wrists without constraining my blood flow. The fabric is not comfortable. It's very smooth, but must have some chemical or material that irritates my skin. The color doesn't look like the picture (VERY green, not brown like the picture). It's also very thick, but lightweight. Odd, indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Wyrmwood

customer_reviews.title: A Best Buy👍💯
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a navy blue and white 2xl shirt and I gotta say, I'm very pleased with my shirt! Fits perfect, thick and warm official flannel/fleece. At first I was skeptical on ordering it and it being thin and cheaply made. Nope!!! You'll get a nice warm flannel shirt here, and I've ordered a second shirt already as a gift. So I'd definitely recommend this item/seller. Delivery was fast, on time also! Thnx👍
customer_reviews.author: Dee915

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, well constructed, just heavy *enough*. I love this shirt. BUT, as a bigger guy, I ordered this one in XL and another in 2X. Both were sized appropriately EXCEPT the wrists! I know there isn't a lot of meat around the wrist bones, no matter how large you are, but these are extraordinarily tight fitting when buttoned at the wrist. And there is only one button at the wrists to fasten it, instead of the more common two buttons, for different sizes of wrists. The rest of the shirt is at least as good as you are going to find anywhere else at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Oktyabr

customer_reviews.title: purchase and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is definately a flannel shirt! Bought for my husband and he loves it. He did however try wearing it on a decent fall day and did say it's a winter shirt. Too warm for any other season. He also said it was super comfortable we were slightly worried it was be that "scratchy material" but it was soft. Extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shirt, runs a little narrow in the body
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality shirt for the money. My son is about 6'2" and weighs about 185. He wears a large t-shirt and has a 33 inch waist. He's tall and slim. I thought the body fit a little slimmer than what I expected and the sleeves are barely long enough, his sleeve length in dress shirts are 34". He's wearing the shirt as part of his costume for a play he's in, although he'll probably wear it at some point in the future for normal wear. I don't know how the XL runs, but I would try it for him if I thought it was something he would be wearing often.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2agr8boy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, well-made, warm
customer_reviews.text: Most shirts of this type are flannel, which is nice but often shrinks and deteriorates over time. I wanted to try this shirt because it's fleece instead of flannel. I love it. The fabric is super comfortable against the skin, and it's very warm. It could pay for itself in under a week by allowing you to turn down the heat in your house. The shirt is sized as expected, well constructed, buttons securely attached, etc. I bought a second one because I liked the first so much. I'm about 6-2 and 230 and the 2XL fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ken_Ind

customer_reviews.title: Product Is Very Comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: I received this flannel today and it's super comfortable, color looks exactly like the Amazon photo, and it's great, BUT it runs very big. I got the XL Tall and it's a good length, but it's very loose around my waist. I'm 6'2 255, somewhat built, and usually wear 2XL shirts. I thought an XL might be too small, now I'm thinking I might be able to wear a L haha. If you have a beer gut then you'll be good! Great product tho!
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: Quality fleece shirt
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at several local stores for fleece shirts like this for a long time. When I found this one on Amazon, I bought it just to see if it has "true size". When I got it, I was satisfied with the quality, size and feel of it. Then I went back and ordered 4 more of different colors. These type of shirts last a long time if you take care of it. Could not be happier. A great choice for me. I highly recommend these types of shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Poppatoy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt...BUT
customer_reviews.text: I have the Blue shirt and wanted another so I bought the red one. Just got it today and could not wait to try it on. The fit was nice until I tried to button the cuffs. They were very tight on me. I am not over weight at all. I am 5'11" and weigh 182. All my shirts are size large as I like the room inside them. The blue shirt allows me to easily put on and off while the cuffs are already buttoned. Cannot do that with this shirt which is a shame. Very nice feel to this shirt just like my blue one. just too tight at the cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: elder

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm shirt
customer_reviews.text: This fleece shirt is not heavyweight as advertised. It is more mediumweight, which is better and what I needed. It’s not as soft as other brands, but still soft and warm, perfect for late fall hunting trips! Size small is what I bought and a perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Yobcibmuag

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men ladies
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is thick and comfortable. I bought it for myself because I wanted an oversized flannel that wasn’t form fitted like is custom with women’s shirts. I bought a medium and it was oversized and long. I am 5’7” and 150 lbs for reference. It wasn’t so big as to look baggy. It was also long enough to cover my butt. Great as an additional layer on a chilly hike
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M

customer_reviews.title: Remember the color shown may vary from what you receive
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality shirt for the money. My only problem is that when I received it I was disappointed with the color. In all fairness I know everybody’s eyes perceive color differently. The original picture I seen looked more like a dark color and a yellow blend . The shirt I received appears to my eyes to be the darker blue blended with A green color. Nevertheless it is still a quality shirt.
customer_reviews.author: PJB

customer_reviews.title: Soft and holds up well through multiple washes
customer_reviews.text: This is super soft and comfortable. Although it’s men’s and I’m female it’s perfect casual wear and perfect length for leggings. I purchased my first one last year and looks great after 25+ washes and all buttons stayed on. 5’5 150 purchased a medium
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt BUT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shirt for the price, but I have to ground myself when putting it on. Similar to a Van de Graaff generator I created a serious spark when I put it on and grounded myself at the sink. Our humidity here in Arizona is around 10% right now. It might be ok for people living in cooler areas with higher humidity. I won't be buying another one. Sticking to 100% cotton flannel.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Black

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy shirt, very uncomfy inner neck trim
customer_reviews.text: Would've gave 5 stars but took off two for the uncomfortable scratchy synthetic trim used on the inside of the collar.....it feels quite annoying on my neck and as a result, I can only wear it over a hoodie or it is bothersome. Other than that it's a great shirt as its warm and soft(except for that stupid choice of neck trim material) and cut roomy enough. Overall a quality shirt at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: I’m done with heavy flannels!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’m done with ‘heavy flannel’ shirts. I bought 4 heavy flannels and 3 shrunk and they were extra large. The sleeves come half way up my ‘fore arms’. These shirts don’t shrink and they are not to thick but warm. Lg fits perfectly. I’m 6 ft about 180#s
customer_reviews.author: M. lowry

customer_reviews.title: Size runs slightly large, but not significantly.
customer_reviews.text: Size runs slightly large, but not significantly. Very warm and much heavier than a regular flannel shirt. Slightly itchy but not bad, maybe it'll become less itchy with more washes, but again, its not so bad that I wouldn't order another one. The price is very fair which is oe of the things that led me to the rating I gave it. The buttons are quite large compared to most shirts. that might be a good or bad thing depending how you like that feature. I'm rating it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Andybuildz

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is soft, warm and the blue is really gorgeous. However, there's a 2-inch opening in the left side. It arrived with this defect. I can fix it, but thought it worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: It's me, Wendy.

customer_reviews.title: WranglerAuthentics Men's Long Sleeve Plaid -- a fine fleece shirt, comparable to higher end Carhartts.
customer_reviews.text: next to Carhartt, I find Wrangler to be the most consistent and predictable makers of mens' apparel. This plaid appears [on Amazon] as a brown, but when received it was definitely shades of gray and charcoal. If you are ordering based on color, be advised. If you are ordering based on fit, I highly recommend. Runs slightly on the larger, plenty of arm length but not "floppy" -- fyi.
customer_reviews.author: just being Frank

customer_reviews.title: Watch the sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the right size! I had to send it back 2 different times before I got it right. I'm 5'10" 175-180 lbs and medium was the prefect fit. I started out with an XL, I was swimming in it. So then I went down to a large, but it was still big around the body. Medium was somewhat of a snug fit, which is what I was going for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true flannel
customer_reviews.text: The shirt fits fine and I like the way it looks, but it is not flannel in the classic sense. Most of the confusion is probably my fault, because I was going off the pictures and didn't read the whole description. The material is considerably more "fuzzy" than flannel and is 100% polyester, so I would classify it as fleece. With that being said, my wife loves this one (and the blue one I got at the same time) as sleep shirts, so not a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a XXL. Usually, any XXL IS a bit snug. (Damn IPAs) However, this one fits perfectly. If you are a slim XXL this shirt may fit a bit big. It’s warm and cozy. Seem to be made well also. I got it for out doors/garage work. I think this is the one. I wasn’t much of a Wrangler fan but I love this shirt already. I would/May but it again. Update: 17Jan2019 The shirt is $14.99 regular price at Wally World.
customer_reviews.author: LiteningKid

customer_reviews.title: Soft and surprisingly thick
customer_reviews.text: Now days every manufacturer seems to be skimping on quality This flannel is actually thick I was very surprised at the softness and thickness of it
customer_reviews.author: Palmbch

customer_reviews.title: okay case for LG 7 thinQ
customer_reviews.text: Had this Case for less than a month.... Case does its job by keeps the phone from getting beat up. BUT...color on back of this case is already chipping on edges and wearing off, and the kick stand is flimsy. Last thing, kinda picky but, the kick stand is hard to open. I have to use a pen or pocket knife to snap open. A person with strong fingernails might be able to open, I can't. I would not recommend this case to a friend or family.
customer_reviews.author: OUPicker Retail

customer_reviews.title: My son is 6' 2" and weigh about 285 lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6' 2" and weigh about 285 lbs. I bought him a 3XL, so he could put another t-shirt or thermals, or UNDER ARMOR under this shirt. He tried it on, the arms, the length, the chest all fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 2 plus mom

customer_reviews.title: So nice I’d even ‘gift it !’
customer_reviews.text: I thought this shirt was flannel - it is not. It is fleece. So soft and warm, and comfy. It washes and dries beautifully !! He has already worn it three times. I foresee this becoming his favorite warm shirt this fall/winter. I am very impressed with how nicely sewn this shirt is, and am thrilled that it is so much more than a thin flannel. It runs a little on the large size...but as he always layers shirts, in cold weather, it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shirt For The Money
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find fleece shirts so I was thrilled when I found this one. I have another fleece shirt by different manufacturer that I just love but I couldn't find that brand anywhere. This Wrangler shirt is not quite as thick or heavy a fleece as the one I already had but it is still a nice shirt that fits well and looks great. I think Wrangler makes a few other colors that I might also order because I like fleece shirts in the winter. They are less bulky than layering a thinner shirt with a sweater but just as warm if not warmer.
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrangler shirt
customer_reviews.text: the fit is nice and looks great but not a true heavy weight shirt good for fall or a layer shirt after a washing i found the shirt tail would roll up ...this is a sign of poor design/quality...you can iron it out but in short time in wearing it or the next wash youll have the same issue ..personally i would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rick East Branch ny

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much at the top of my pile of shirts :)
customer_reviews.text: A shirt like this you don't mind a little large. You wear it over a tee shirt or turtle neck, depending on the weather, and it's all good. The only size issue I would raise is the positioning of the sleeve buttons. They seem a little (very little) tight. I don't expect to put the shirt on while wearing gloves, but even barehanded it seems borderline too snug. I don't know how to quantify it, but a little less tight/more loose would be swell. That said, as others have mentioned, it is very warm and comfortable. Frankly, I was and am pleasantly surprised. I will get another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: IraLA

customer_reviews.title: A good shirt to wear to therapy sessions
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is lucky I'm giving it 4 stars. It's so soft and thick and warm and rugged. It's a good shirt. But... why mess with my psyche Wrangler? Sure I'm not big, but I am a medium. I wear medium everything. Why must you make me feel smaller than I already feel? Send me a medium shirt large enough that I can swim in? Make me go through the effort of returning the medium and then ordering a small that fits me perfectly? Why?! Why make me go through all that trauma? Note: The warm, thick, soft sleeves are great for crying into.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis J. Craghead

customer_reviews.title: Go to shacket! (shirt/jacket)
customer_reviews.text: Great fleece flannel! Got one as a gift and had to grab another because my gf keeps stealing the other one. Seems well constructed and is very soft and warm. Depending on what kind of fit you like this can be worn as a shirt or over layers like a light jacket. Length a little long which as a tall man I like. The cut isn't huge though so it's not billowy or oversize looking. Great shirt at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Light fleece jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is not a flannel, it’s fleece. Two entirely different fabrics. I noticed some reviews complaining about this, but it says fleece in the title. Fleece is a warm outerwear material, so this is definitely more of a jacket than a shirt. I love it as a jacket, very soft and warm, perfect for 40-50 degree weather. Doesn’t take up a lot of room in a suitcase, doesn’t wrinkle, dries quickly. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhandra

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Husband is 6’2” 220lb and has an long wingspan (longer arms than average). This fit him great as far as length from neck to hips, but the arms were slightly short and the fit was ok. It wasn’t as “crisp” looking as the photo due to the material. Overall it was great for family photos and the material is warm
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Fits big, but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is as pictured and quite comfortable/warm. However, it fits big for the size. I wear medium in most everything and nothing super slim. This fits very much like a large and is quite boxy. For a sweatshirt, it'd be great, but as a shirt, I might have been okay with a small. Ultimately, I returned the shirt and got something different.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Nice fleece shirts for the winter.
customer_reviews.text: The Wrangler Authentics Men's Long Sleeve Heavyweight Plaid Fleece Shirts make a nice addition to my winter attire. The colors are nice and bright. I usually go for flannel over fleece, but the price was right on these shirts. Fleece tends to hold in the heat a little better than flannel, so I am looking forward to wearing them this winter in the outdoors. These ran a little large, so I will be wearing them as an outer garment over thermals and sweatshirts.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a medium and it was to big. The samll is the new medium
customer_reviews.text: All of my flannel shirts are to big. I guess it is normal for flannel shirts to be a little big. Anyway I love this shirt. It is just the right weight for me. But I bought the medium and felt it was to big. Thanks to the awesome amazon return policy I sent it back and ordered a small. The small is just right. Just to be clear I wear a medium in many other styles of shirts. I will be purchasing more of these wrangler shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fleece shirt is very warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I broke my wrist and needed something to wear to PT that would go over my cast. I'm a female and used to wear flannel shirts all the time. I was hesitant on a fleece shirt as their lint magnets, but it's good. I actually keep it on the back of my home office chair for when I catch a chill. I would buy again. I have the black/blue and it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Reezie

customer_reviews.title: Medium Fit Well for 6' Foot and Lean
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is 6 foot and ~175lbs. The Medium fits him really well. It's definitely a plush fleece - NOT flannel material. Still soft and comfy! Only thing to note - you most likely will have to unbutton the end of the sleeves to put the shirt on/off each time (tighter fit at wrists). Good value for the item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size. A bit thicker than you might expect.
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this purchase. Fits perfectly, though arms a little long. May shrink up in wash. Body-wise it fits great. Material is a bit thicker/heavier than I expected, but that might just be me. It will work out as I do delivery in evenings and with the colder months coming up, I believe this will work very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: diecast fiend

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: 5'5 150 lbs female, bought an XL. Wanted a baggy look and I love it! Will keep me v warm this fall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small cuffs.
customer_reviews.text: Being an XLT, this item should fit larger folks. It is long enough, but the cuffs a small and are difficult to put hands through when buttoned. May return it for that reason. Otherwise it is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M

customer_reviews.title: Colors were way off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red, black, and white shirt and received the ugliest red and purple thick flannel shirt. I could see it was a lot fuzzier and thicker than the one in the picture and the colors were WAY off, like whoa. I returned it same day. Not one person in the entire family wanted it even after I offered it to them for free. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Warm at Last
customer_reviews.text: This shirt was bought for a senior man who lives in an Assisted living home and he is always cold. Yesterday for the first time in Months he was warm and so grateful for the shirt. The shirt is so nice and soft and the color is great. He looked handsome in it. Will be getting more for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Keck

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to button this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I had been given this shirt (Wrangler Buffalo Plaid) in Blue, and decided to order a Red one also. It arrived as promised, but the buttons on this one seem thicker than the Blue one and the button holes are a little small (shorter) so it is very difficult to button and unbutton. I wear it as an over shirt and do not button it up, so once I got it unbuttoned it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderhill

customer_reviews.title: Love this fleece
customer_reviews.text: I wear a fleece shirt as a light jacket on cool fall days or inside the house on really cold days. The women's fleece blouses are cut short, don't have pockets, and aren't as roomy as the men's fleece shirts. I love this shirt, I bought a small and the tails are nice and long and the sleeves cover my wrists.It's lightweight and washes well, a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fleece material, not flannel
customer_reviews.text: The 3 star review is simply because it wasn't what I had expected- it is a fine shirt though. I was thinking it would be more of a flannel material (probably because of the pattern) when it is actually very fleecy (almost like a fleece blanket). My boyfriend will decide if he likes it or not and we may return it. I'd say that this would be a fine shirt to lounge around in but maybe not one to go out in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gals, too!
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman doing a ton of work outside and inside (renovation) on our home. This shirt is so soft, so durable, so perfect for protecting my arms from being scratched, marked, etc. I love it. It feels so great I keep rubbing the fabric. I am a size medium woman and I ordered a men's small. Not only does it look great on me and makes me more interested in buying men's clothes but I get a ton of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Wrangler didn't dissapoint!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, if you refer to wranglers website, they have a sizing chart that explains how they measure, the sleeve measurements seem long until you see where they measure from. one caveat.. I'm 5'7 125 lbs, that being said, I don't have huge wrists, and I couldn't get my hands out of the sleeves without unbuttoning the cuffs first. this is a very minor and solvable problem, leave the cuffs unbuttoned. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Fabel

customer_reviews.title: Wrangler has a winner with this shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Had two of these on my Wish List but ordered only one to make sure of the fit and quality. I ordered the Red Plaid (which is, as I type, out of stock) in a Small and it fit perfectly (I'm 5'6'' and 140 lbs.). It looks and feels great and fits in all the right places (the tail comes down to about the middle of the crotch). The construction is solid and with proper washing should last a long time. Will be ordering the Blue Plaid shortly. Wrangler has a winner with this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely delicate fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I went by their chart and it still came out large for my friend. When it arrived it was like a big fluffy shirt looking like the normal cabin/outdoor shirts. The best way to describe it is it's like fluffy like cotton candy, gets fuzz balls very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Update:  Order a size smaller than your usual fit
customer_reviews.text: Update: I ordered a size small which fits better - only issue is that it is slightly short. Hope it doesn‘t shrink. Original review: Looks like nice material. However I am 6’0” and 170 lbs and the size Medium is way too big in the waist. I suppose it is true to size in that the sizing chart says waist is 38-40”. Yes the waist will fit someone with a 40” waist.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: bought 2 this and the red and black size xl
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old son is so hard to buy for he is almost 6 foot 5, 180 pound so every time I buy him a shirt it's never long enough , but these where perfect and he loved them both he wears them over his graphic t shirts and they are the perfect length even when he raises his arms up they still cover his waist.
customer_reviews.author: Marc and Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality; thick and warm
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because it is what it should be. Don’t get this confused with a thin flannel. It’s THICK and warm. My husband wore this for outdoor Christmas pictures and he was so hot! We live in AZ and it’s 82 and sunny. It is nice quality. Also, it’s roomy. My husband is 6’2” and 200 pounds. He’s usually a large so that’s what we ordered but he did have a good amount extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

product_meta.title: Wrangler Authentics Men's Long Sleeve Heavyweight Plaid Fleece Shirt
product_meta.description:
Wrangler Authentics Men's Fleece Lined Fleece. The Wrangler Authentics Men's Fleece combines comfort and style. Crafted with two-sided brushed fleece, this shirt is built with a relaxed fit in order to provide comfort and warmth for any outdoor occasion. 

FEATURES

 * Versatile Fit . Built to have a classic denim jacket fit and feel with the comfort of a flex fabric.
 * Comfortable Materials. Plush polyester fabric guaranteed to give all day comfort.
 * Functionality. Can be buttoned up as a shirt or buttoned down as a lightweight jacket over a shirt.
 * Storage. Two pockets are provided to accessible storage.



For nearly 70 years, Wrangler has staked its claim as a global leader in jeanswear, casual apparel and fashion-forward western inspired attire. Built upon the nostalgic undercurrent of Americana heritage, the brand celebrates a rich legacy of authentic products consumers crave. Wrangler continues to preserve their American legacy while continuously developing innovative products that harness traditional roots, while expanding on its mainstream appeal as a fashion-forward label. Wrangler will prepare you for whatever the day may hold. So go ahead, be bold. Be adventurous. Be comfortable in your own jeans.
feature_bullets: BUILT FOR COMFORT. Made with comfort and function in mind, this two-sided brushed fleece will keep you warm all season long. Your new wardrobe favorite.
VERSATILE FIT. Perfect for layering in the winter or during cool fall evenings, this relaxed fit flannel doesn't restrict movement so you can keep warm and keep moving on those colder days.

FUNCTIONAL STYLE. Made with 100% Polyester, this brushed fleece shirt is designed with style and function in mind. Wear it on the job or out to lunch with friends, this essential staple can be worn for many occasions.
DURABLE FINISHINGS. Finished with heavy-duty plastic buttons, this fleece is built to last. Button cuff closure and collar lined with Polyester designed to keep the warmth in, and the cold air out.
ADDED STORAGE. Constructed with (2) button front pockets, this fleece shirt has easy-access storage for all your basic necessities.
